snippet: Some mining companies lease land at less than market rate and enjoy low royalty rates, at the expense of taxpayers, investigators say.
lead_paragraph: Some mining companies lease land at less than market rate and enjoy low royalty rates, at the expense of taxpayers, investigators say.

headline.main: U.S. Charging Coal Companies Too Little for Land, Report Says
headline.print_headline: U.S. Charging Coal Companies Too Little for Land, Report Says
